item.title: How CCA alignment and cell label transfer work in Seurat
item.description: To not miss a post like this, sign up for my newsletter to learn computational biology and bioinformatics. Understand CCA Following my last blog post on PCA projection and cell label transfer, we are going to talk about CCA. In single-cell RNA-seq data integration using Canonical Correlation Analysis (CCA), we typically align two matrices representing different datasets, where both datasets have the same set of genes but different numbers of cells.
